```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

# load libraries
library(tidymodels)
```

# Model fit 1:
```{r}
knn1_fit <- readRDS("models/knn1_fit.Rds")

knn1_fit %>%
  collect_metrics() %>%
  filter(.metric == "roc_auc")
```

# Model fit 2:

```{r}
knn2_fit <- readRDS("models/knn2_fit.Rds")

knn2_fit %>%
  show_best(metric = "roc_auc", n = 5)
```
